messages.title: Top 10 Broken Promises of the Tory/Lib-Dem coalition (there are many more!)
messages.content: Inside this leaflet you will see just some of the policies Labour is putting forward as part of its plan for government and below you will see ten very good reasons not to vote for the Conservatives or Liberal Democrats.

issues.environment: Environment. Prior to the last general election, David Cameron promised to lead the 'Greenest Government Ever'. Since getting the keys to Downing Street however, he has done far too little and people have seen through his 'husky hugging' photo opportunities.
issues.health: NHS reorganisation. David Cameron promised there would be no more top-down reorganisations of the NHS, one of the biggest reorganisations in the Health Service's history!
issues.immigration: Immigration. David Cameron promised to bring immigration down—'no ifs no buts'—but recent figures show his plan has failed. Immigration is now three times the level he promised and over 50,000 higher than when he took office.

leaflet.personalStatement: HERE IS WHY I AM ASKING YOU TO VOTE LABOUR ON 7 MAY
leaflet.additionalNotes: SEND ME YOUR EXAMPLES OF BROKEN TORY/LIB-DEM PROMISES - SEE FORM ON PAGE 3
